data.name: Up to Par
data.detailed_description:
Golf your way through procedural levels, staying under par and using your spare shots to purchase upgrades.

Each run will take planning and skill to progress as far as you can and unlock the next course. Can you beat your record? Will you be victorious against your friends?

Infinite Levels


Each course is procedurally generated, giving you new challenges to overcome each run.

Roguelite Progression


Progress as far as you can by purchasing abilities to help your run. Permanently unlock new abilities to jump-start your future attempts.

Unique Courses


The further you progress in your runs, the more courses you unlock. Each course is unique, with new challenges to discover.

Cooperate or Compete


Golf co-operatively with up to 4 players, sharing your resources and working together to push further each run. Play competitively with up to 16 players.

data.short_description: Up to Par is a run-based roguelite minigolf game. Stay under par, or you're out! Play solo or with up to 16 players through procedural levels, spend your spare shots to unlock abilities, and push your golf game to the limit across unique environments.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad(s) recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.8
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad(s) recommended
